TopicTitle: [Artwork] For those of you with dual monitors, I made a wallpaper.

Articles.Content:
I just landed on Duna, so I made a wallpaper that fits well on dual monitors. It looks kinda wonky in the preview, but it looks fantastic.

Instructions: The image is designed for dual 1920x1080 monitors (16:9 aspect ratio). Right click the image (click on the preview until you are at the raw image file.) and select "set as desktop background" and then select "Tile." The picture will fill both monitors with each image on a screen.

Those of you running 1600x900, or running a single monitor, there'll be some cropping to do.
